name: Wollahyde
text: That's $5000,^9 cash. Whoever returns to me at the end of the board with the most Palladium Blocks (PdB) shall be rewarded handsomely.

name: Wollahyde
text: Now,^5 do you all understand how the game is played?

name: Wollahyde
text: Assuming you do,^5 I've got some Call and Put contracts to offer you.^9 Interested?
